data.name: Infinadeck Medieval Maze
data.detailed_description:
This virtual reality maze is a basic experience for the Infinadeck Omnidirectional Treadmill. It takes just under 2 minutes at max speed to get from the start to the end when using the treadmill- how fast can you make it through? Many objects are interactable within the space, and there are a couple of Easter eggs here and there. Designed for first time walkers, there are no jumpscares or things chasing you- the nuances of the experiences are up to you. Will you clear the maze as fast as possible? Or perhaps stroll through at your own pace?

This maze was built using free assets from the Unity Store, including the SteamVR Unity Plugin, so it seemed right that this project be distributed for free as well.

Useful desktop keybinds:
Spacebar: Stop Treadmill
RightShift: Start Treadmill
Keypad0: Start/Stop Treadmill
Keypad9: Boot/Shutdown/Reboot Infinadeck Plugin

LeftShift: Reset Level
Escape: Quit Game

Keypad1: Toggle Deck Ring
Keypad2: Toggle Deck Edge
Keypad3: Toggle Deck Center
Keypad4: Toggle Reference Panel
Keypad5: Toggle In-Engine Deck
Keypad6: Toggle Heading
Keypad7: Toggle Colorblind
Keypad8: Cycle Panel Theme
KeypadPeriod: Import Preferences
KeypadEnter: Reset Preferences

Alpha1: Set Timer to 1 Minute
Alpha2: Set Timer to 2 Minutes
Alpha3: Set Timer to 3 Minutes
Alpha4: Set Timer to 4 Minutes
Alpha5: Set Timer to 5 Minutes
Alpha6: Set Timer to 6 Minutes
Alpha7: Set Timer to 7 Minutes
Alpha8: Set Timer to 8 Minutes
Alpha9: Set Timer to 9 Minutes
Alpha0: Set Timer to 10 Minutes

data.short_description: A twisty-turny castle maze designed to show off the strengths of the Infinadeck omnidirectional treadmill. Designed for both slow and fast walkers, this experience is fun for all ages when paired with a full virtual reality setup.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
